snippet: Alex Ramirez, 37, a Venezuelan who has played in Japan since 2000, recently reached a combined 2,000 hits in his pro career, and is in range of having 2,000 hits in Japan.
abstract: Japanese league outfielder Alex Ramirez, a Venezuelan who has played professional baseball in Japan since 2000, has reached a combined 2,000 hits in his pro career, including his time in Major League Baseball, and is in range of having 2,000 hits in Japan.
lead_paragraph: Alex Ramirez, 37, a Venezuelan who has played in Japan since 2000, recently reached a combined 2,000 hits in his pro career, and is in range of having 2,000 hits in Japan.

headline.seo: Alex Ramirez, With 2,000 Hits, Awaits Honor for Japanese Milestone
headline.main: Where No Westerner in Japan Has Gone
headline.print_headline: Where No Westerner in Japan Has Gone
